description:
Our lovely one bedroom apartment located in Washington Heights is close to Columbia Presbyterian Hospital, parks, and the A/C/1 trains for commuting to Times Square/Midtown/Downtown.  It takes just 30 minutes from here to Midtown. You’ll love our place because our apartment has high ceilings, a full kitchen, TV with roku, Wifi, wood floors, and lots of light!

Hardwood floors.  Very clean.  One bedroom with a double bed and darkening curtains.  Living room with couch, piano and TV with Roku, Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, etc. Kitchen area available for your use, with refrigerator, stove, sink, and eating area.  Full bath with tile floor, tub and shower combo.  Please make yourself at home!

None!  Our home is yours.  We will be available via text/call or the messenger if an issues arises!

Close to A/C/1 train lines at 168th Street Station.  Lots of buses nearby, too.  The A train runs express to midtown/times square in less than 30 minutes.  Walking distance to Columbia Presbyterian Hospital.

Our home is on the 5th floor of a walk-up building.
name: Spacious Washington Heights Home
